title: Define Project Scope and Requirements: Asistente Neurofeedback
description: Craft a comprehensive document detailing the project requirements, user stories, desired features, and non-functional requirements (e.g., performance, security, scalability, maintainability) for the neurofeedback assistant. This includes identifying specific use cases, target audience, system architecture, and any additional technical details necessary to fully understand the project scope.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including hardware components, software modules, and data flow.

title: Develop Hardware Components
description: Design and develop the hardware components required for neurofeedback data acquisition and processing.

title: Develop Software Components
description: Develop the software components for data processing, visualization, and user interface.

title: Implement Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management system for neurofeedback data.

title: Develop Testing and Quality Assurance Plan
description: Develop a comprehensive testing and quality assurance plan for the neurofeedback assistant.

title: Implement Comprehensive Security and Privacy Measures for Data Protection and User Privacy
description: Implement robust security measures to ensure data protection, user privacy, and compliance with relevant regulations (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA). This includes encryption, secure communication protocols, access controls, data anonymization, regular vulnerability assessments, and adherence to best practices for securing sensitive data. Also, consider the implementation of opt-in user consent mechanisms.

title: Develop Deployment and DevOps Strategy for Neurofeedback Assistant
description: Create a comprehensive deployment and DevOps strategy for the neurofeedback assistant, encompassing continuous integration, continuous delivery/deployment (CI/CD), containerization, infrastructure provisioning, monitoring, and logging. Ensure adherence to scalability, reliability, and security best practices, focusing on flexibility to accommodate real-time neurofeedback requirements.

title: Create User Documentation and Training Materials
description: Create user documentation, training materials, and support resources for the neurofeedback assistant.
